name: LocalityTest
description: Unit tests for the Locality class, focusing on locale-related functionalities.

test_cases.name: allSupportedLocales
test_cases.description: Tests that the list of all supported locales is correctly loaded and matches the expected count and content.

test_cases.name: displayName
test_cases.description: Tests that the display name method returns a non-empty string.

test_cases.name: localeStringRandom
test_cases.description: Tests that the localeStringWithRandom method uses the random number generator passed as an argument and produces deterministic results with a fixed seed.

test_cases.name: localeStringWithRandom
test_cases.description: Tests that the localeStringWithRandom method returns a locale that is within the set of all supported locales.

test_cases.name: localeStringWithoutReplacement
test_cases.description: Tests that the localeStringWithoutReplacement method returns unique locales and that all returned locales are within the set of all supported locales.

test_cases.name: localeString
test_cases.description: Tests that the localeString method returns a locale that is within the set of all supported locales.

test_cases.name: localeWithoutReplacement
test_cases.description: Tests that the localeStringWithoutReplacement method returns a non-null locale.
